title: A Randomized Double-Blind, Active-Controlled  Study of LUP-223 (calcineurin inhibitor) in Patients With Crohn's Disease
officialTitle: A Randomized Double-Blind, Active-Controlled  Study of LUP-223 (calcineurin inhibitor) in Patients With Crohn's Disease
description: This is a randomized double-blind, active-controlled  study designed to evaluate the efficacy and safety of LUP-223 (calcineurin inhibitor) in patients with Crohn's Disease. The study will enroll approximately 70 patients.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Adults aged 27-84 years
- Confirmed diagnosis of Crohn's Disease
- ECOG performance status 0-1
- Adequate organ function
- Willing and able to provide informed consent

Exclusion Criteria:
- Known hypersensitivity to study drug or excipients
- Pregnant or breastfeeding women
- Participation in another interventional study within 30 days
- Significant cardiovascular disease within past 6 months
- Active or chronic infection requiring systemic treatment
